General.Name: Zhejiang Shengda Pharm
General.Description: Zhejiang Shengda Bio-Pharm Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells food and feed additives for pharmaceutical, nutritional, food, and animal feed industry. It offers vitamins, such as biotin and folic acid; biological preservatives, including nisin and natamycin; and intermediate APIs. The company is based in Tiantai, China.
General.Address: No. 789, Renmin East Road, Tiantai, China, 317200
